name: Ball Runner (BrossDev)
description:
⭐Fast racing mechanics
Immerse into a fast racing gameplay where you jump through the obstacles laid by the red team

⭐Deathrun game
Have a real deathrun time with your teammates being defeated on the dangerous road to the finish line

⭐Win the game
Intrude into a red team's base after finishing the road and defeat them first to get yet another point for your team

⭐Jumping skills
Play harder level modes and become a better jumper

⭐Unique levels
All levels are unique - try to complete them all

FEATURES:

⚫Local player

Have fun jumping with your ball!

Coming soon:
⚫Multiplayer
⚫Ball level upgrades

See twitch streams on game development: https://www.twitch.tv/brt_games
